name: TinyDropTimes

placeholder.description: Set the prompt placeholder text in the input box
placeholder.description_zh: 设置输入框内的提示占位文本

popper-append-to-body.description: Whether to insert a popover into the body element. If there is a problem with the positioning of the pop-up, you can set this property to false (see Select Component)
popper-append-to-body.description_zh: 是否将弹出框插入至 body 元素。在弹出框的定位出现问题时，可将该属性设置为 false (可参考 select 组件)

popper-class.description: The class class name added to the DropTimes drop-down box
popper-class.description_zh: 为 DropTimes 下拉弹框添加的 class 类名

size.description: Enter the size of the field

events.name: change
events.description: This event is triggered after the drop-down switches the current time
events.description_zh: 下拉切换当前时间后触发该事件

description: 时间选值框是下拉框的特例，按时分格式（不支持自定义格式）展示下拉列表以供用户选择，并能扩展下拉框部分参数。
description_zh: 时间选值框是下拉框的特例，按时分格式（不支持自定义格式）展示下拉列表以供用户选择，并能扩展下拉框部分参数。
